parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and stello; set apart, i.e. to send out literally or figuratively.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
And he, she, it, and that. From kai and ekeinos; likewise that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural
Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To flay, flog, scourge, beat. A primary verb; properly, to flay, i.e. to scourge, or to thrash.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural

str2: To put to death, kill; fig: I abolish. From apo and kteino; to kill outright; figuratively, to destroy.
